attributes.action: Stop dog torture and slaughter in Asia.
attributes.additional_details:
http://www.animal-rights-action.com/dog-meat.html#Skinned Alive / Boiled Alive / Baked Alive And Other Methods Of Killing

http://www.animalhopeandwellness.org
attributes.background:
In the Asian dog meat trade millions of dogs are tortured and savagely killed by people who believe the more terrified the
animal is before death, the better the meat tastes. Skinned, boiled, electrocuted, tied, beaten, dismembered while they are ALIVE are just SOME of the methods used. END IT NOW

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition, in its current form because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The UK Government and Parliament does not have the power to stop it, however it could raise the issue with the Governments in countries which this is happening. You could start a petition calling on the Government to do that.
